reviews.review_msg: Nice person but incredibly dull lectures. Have to rely on the textbook as she doesn't teach that much. You will have a page maybe two of notes for each class and she will waste time on trying to get a discussion but isn't really good at getting them going. This is a 3 hour lecture not seminar or tutorial. I wish she would TEACH!
Denise is my favorite!  I feel like I have learned more from being in one of her classes then I did in four years of University combined.  Look out for her dry sense of humour-hysterical!!!
